Text:
any luck finding chapters 8-13

I wish I known you were doing this; just did 1-7

My guess is that it's like a seventh inning stretch. A whirlwind of seven eps in two days is what caught my eye.

Either that or NetFlix has hooked the video addicts but good and now the other shoe drops.

personally, I wait for the whole thing before I watch any of it - but being a voluntary shut-in, it's an easy decision to make.

Gonna watch Elementary now. More eps up until (and hopefully beyond) #7 coming soon.

AVIGUY

Oh, meant to apologize for going dark for a half hour or so. When I'm uploading new torrents, my bandwidth is so saturated sometimes that web pages fail to load. So, I stop my uploads for a minute or so until the task is complete.

Noticed some time later that I'd completely forgot to start it up again. maybe it's living in a fantasy land of my own choosing, or maybe it's all these drugs. Dunno. Sorry, Slipping and sliding from one universe to the next and I lose track.

AVIGUY

netflix supposedly released all 13 eps at once.  I just hope there are no DRM problems with the later eps.  

after having to wait for the British to post Lilyhammer I was surprised this was up so fast
